original_title: The WW2 Boomer Myth Is Breaking Down And All The Lies Along With It   — The Donald
article_summary: Discussion on the "Boomer Myth" in relation to World War 2: Some users argue that Boomers did not fight in the war, but rather were born after it. Others claim that the generation started the problems we face today. The conversation also touches on the high tax rates and the perceived struggle of the Boomer generation, as well as the control of information and narratives in society.</s>
